localMovies.name: Youth Glory
localMovies.title: Youth Glory
localMovies.description: Marrying out of need, a noble and a royal unite against a looming threat to the kingdom — but their desperate alliance might just turn into true romance.

localTV.name: Bet
localTV.title: Bet
localTV.description: At a private school where gambling determines social status, a skillful new student with a mysterious past is shaking things up — and betting on revenge.
localTV.genre: TV Dramas, Teen TV, Shows, US TV Shows
localTV.cast: Miku Martineau, Ayo Solanke, Clara Alexandrova, more

localTV.name: Tastefully Yours
localTV.title: Tastefully Yours
localTV.description: Driven to claim top culinary honors, an arrogant heir meets a low-profile but stubborn chef whose recipes astonish him — sparking an unlikely romance.
localTV.genre: Romantic TV Dramas, TV Dramas, Korean
localTV.cast: Kang Ha-neul, Ko Min-si, Kim Shin-rock, more

localTV.name: Our Unwritten Seoul
localTV.title: Our Unwritten Seoul
localTV.description: Twin sisters, whose similarities end with their looks, swap identities amid personal struggles — embarking on a journey to rediscover love and life.
localTV.cast: Park Bo-young, Park Jin-young, Ryu Kyung-soo, more

localTV.name: Oh My Ghost Clients
localTV.title: Oh My Ghost Clients
localTV.description: A near-fatal accident leaves aimless labor attorney with the ability to see ghosts and a deal to take on their supernatural cases to survive.
localTV.cast: Jung Kyung-ho, Seor In-a, Cha Hak-yeon, more

localTV.name: Incognito
localTV.title: Incognito
localTV.description: In search of redemption, a crew of misfits joins a private military company on a series of deadly missions against the criminal underworld.
localTV.genre: Filipino, TV Dramas, TV Action & Adventure
localTV.cast: Richard Gutierrez, Daniel Padilla, Baron Geisler, more

localTV.name: Sara - Woman in the Shadows
localTV.title: Sara - Woman in the Shadows
localTV.description: The suspicious death of her son pushes a former secret agent back into action, investigating a series of crimes that grows increasingly sinister.
localTV.genre: TV Dramas, Italian, TV Shows Based on Books
localTV.cast: Teresa Saponangelo, Claudia, Gerini, Flavio Furno, more

localTV.name: Mad Unicorn
localTV.title: Mad Unicorn
localTV.description: Hoping to escape poverty, an aspiring entrepreneur comes up with a brilliant idea for a courier service that might just make him rich. But at what cost?
localTV.cast: Natara, Janeyeh Jiranorraphat, Dr. Palang Rocksilp, more

localTV.name: The Haunted Palace
localTV.title: The Haunted Palace
localTV.description: Born with shamanic powers that she refuses to accept, a young woman confronts her gift to rid the Joseon palace of evil spirits and save her first love.
localTV.genre: Romantic TV Dramas, TV Dramas, Korean
localTV.cast: Yook Sung-jae, Kim Ji-yeon, Kim Ji-hun, more

localTV.name: American Manhunt: Osama bin Laden
localTV.title: American Manhunt: Osama bin Laden
localTV.description: From Ground Zero to the mountains of Pakistan, this thrilling documentary series explores the hunt for Osama bin Laden in the decade following 9/11.
